summary: Completed testing of CareerIQ progress endpoint and ProcessingPage backend-driven progress. All 35 backend tests passed. Frontend ProcessingPage correctly polls /api/report/{session_id}/progress every 2 seconds and derives step states from backend data.
passed_tests: Backend /api/report/{session_id}/progress endpoint returns correct data structure: {status, current_step, assembly_state, progress_percent, error}
Progress endpoint returns 404 for non-existent sessions
Progress endpoint returns current_step and assembly_state from MongoDB
Progress endpoint returns initial state (current_step=0, assembly_state='not_started', progress_percent=0) for uploaded sessions
Progress percent is integer between 0-100
current_step is integer between 0-5
assembly_state is valid string ('not_started', 'in_progress', 'ready_for_ui_finalize')
status is valid string ('uploaded', 'processing', 'completed', 'failed')
Progress endpoint handles multiple polling calls correctly
Progress endpoint works after order creation
Progress and report endpoints return consistent status
ProcessingPage UI loads without errors
ProcessingPage polls /api/report/{session_id}/progress endpoint every 2 seconds (verified 3 requests in 6 seconds)
ProcessingPage step states derive from backend data (data-state attribute)
ProcessingPage has all 5 intelligence steps visible
ProcessingPage has progress bar with percentage display
ProcessingPage has rotating status text
Landing page loads correctly with CareerIQ branding
Order page loads correctly with all form elements (Resume, LinkedIn PDF, Target Role, Mobile Number)
All existing v3.1 backend tests still pass (22 tests)
critical_code_review_comments: Progress endpoint correctly calculates progress_percent: Steps 1-4 = 20% each (max 80%), Step 5 caps at 80% until assembly_state='ready_for_ui_finalize'
ProcessingPage correctly removed timer-based progress (STEP_DURATIONS array) and now uses backend polling
ProcessingPage polls every 2 seconds with MAX_POLLS=180 (6 minutes max)
ProcessingPage correctly handles completion: status='completed' AND assembly_state='ready_for_ui_finalize' triggers redirect
ProcessingPage has proper error handling for failed status
All data-testid attributes present for testing (processing-container, progress-bar-container, steps-container, step-1 through step-5, status-text, error-container, try-again-btn)
seed_data_creation: Test sessions created with TEST_ prefix during pytest runs
context_for_next_testing_agent: CareerIQ progress endpoint and ProcessingPage backend-driven progress are fully functional. The /api/report/{session_id}/progress endpoint returns {status, current_step, assembly_state, progress_percent, error}. ProcessingPage polls this endpoint every 2 seconds and derives step states from backend data. Test session a8f9b698-43bb-4802-96d0-2daf6d85c83c exists with status 'uploaded'. To test full progress flow, a session needs to go through payment and analysis (requires Razorpay payment). Backend test file at /app/tests/test_progress_endpoint.py can be reused for regression testing.
